Posts.Content: My hair is "thinning" from navelbine and someone finally called me sir at a drive through today. At this point I just don't give a rat's behind. After 10 years with innumerable Mets I just want to be here next year. They really do not give people enough warning about the level of hair thinning ibrance causes. I have had that too. every time I see those commercials with the ladies talking about what a big fight they're going to put up with their beautiful long hair or they are young and pretty and look great in a scarf I just want to scream.
Posts.Title: The clerk called me "Sir" and my visit to Memorial Sloan Kettering.

Posts.Content: I had Ok results from Halaven / Eribulin but had to discontinue due to neuropathy as in my right thumb just stopped working one day...
Posts.Title: Halaven experiences

Posts.Content: skitzblitz 4 months. I also had a lot of pain. But I discontinued due to neuropathy.
Posts.Title: Halaven experiences

Posts.Content: The side effects I had from Eribulin were low white counts and neuropathy which caused muscle wasting most noticeably in my hand, but also my feet, which was alarming to say the least. The Neulasta I took for the low white counts caused the bone pain. I had taken Neupogen in the past and thought Neulasta would be the same, but it was the shot from Hell. I now use Zarxio which is a biosimilar and it seems to work well with less pain. I had mixed results on my scans, some things better, some worse, some the same. I have had several different treatments over the last ten years, so I already had some neuropathy prior to starting Halaven.
Posts.Title: Halaven experiences

Posts.Content: 10 years for me I try to eat healthy but like Denise I think at this point the chemo makes the difference not my diet, and side effects determine what I eat. Between working full-time and using my time off for treatments and recovery I rarely exercise anymore because of lack of time, side effects and fatigue.
Posts.Title: Question for MBC 5+ years

Posts.Content: Thank you for this post. If not previously tested for PDL1, do you know what is required to get tested? Thanks again!
Posts.Title: New Treatment for TNBC MBC Patients (if PD-l1 Positive)

Posts.Content: Nancy I once tried to duplicate a YouTube video on how to make a flattering head covering out of a T-shirt and when I showed my handiwork off to my husband he told me I look like Osama bin laden :-)
Posts.Title: The clerk called me "Sir" and my visit to Memorial Sloan Kettering.

Posts.Content: I have had lung Mets for over ten years and did have coughing and a reactive airway at some point but for the most part it was caused by acid reflux not the Mets. I took Prilosec for awhile and it went away.
Posts.Title: Coughing

Posts.Content: When I had Dex as a premed my face was flushed and I was high as a kite, then mad at the world when it wore off. Once my legs went numb. My dose was reduced.
Posts.Title: Dexamethasone and chemo
